testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on login page...................................................passed When user enters email and password.........................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: check login is unsuccessful with taking email blank
testcase.system-out: Given page is loaded........................................................passed When user enters password...................................................passed And clicks on login.........................................................passed Then user should be displayed a message error "Login was unsuccessful".....passed

testcase.name: To verify Password field must not be same as that of e-mail.
testcase.system-out: Given page is here..........................................................passed When user enter email and password same as email............................passed Then user showing 'password is not same as e-mail'.........................passed

testcase.name: To verify for valid e-mail and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given page is there.........................................................passed When user enters valid email and invalid password...........................passed Then user should displayed " The credentials provided are incorrect" on page.passed
